# pypokeapi

A simple Python wrapper for "PokeAPI" built using the requests library. 


# dependencies

- Python [requests library](https://requests.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)


# Functions 
- Pokemon Search
- Species Search
- Get ability 
- Get type
- Get a list of pokemon
